column4: I'm new to Ubuntu, as I installed it last night... It's mostly wonderful, but I don't have any sound... The driver is fine, and it's playing, but no sound. The speakers are set to max.
never mind *giggle* I seeped to have paused it somehow
When ubuntu 8.10 comes out on October 30th, be sure to try a clean install of that, as it supports more hardware
do you see a sound device when you do this on the terminal?       lshal | grep sound
if you search through the output of  lshal   and find your sound card I may be able to help you.
I would just wait until october 30th when 8.10 comes out then
in other words, I have an TI Technologies Inc IXP SB4x0 High Definition Audio Controller (rev 01)
I know thatÂ´s a month away but that should work
Over a month without sound? Blah!
